channel.title: Funs on EasyOnHard
channel.description: Recent content in Funs on EasyOnHard

item.title: About
item.description: This is where I am going to put stuff that I think is cool or anything “personal”, like ethics or maybe politics, but I will most likely exclude that because it is a good way to stir up fights. I might write about economics, though. That stuff is fine, maybe.

item.title: Fun Websites
item.description:
This is just a list of cool websites üòÅ

Ana.rchy.gay: Cool, slick website. Very pleasing to the eye!

Polypompholyx: Has a great demonstration of Modular Origami at work.

Last.fm: Not a small site like the first two, but I use it to track my music listening. You should follow me ;)

Birds Aren’t Real: What a fantastic website, kind of like The Church of the FSM.
